iterativeDescription: SAFe is an agile methodology that helps multiple teams within a single program, portfolio, or enterprise scale agile practices such as Scrum, Kanban, and Lean beyond a single team.  It encompasses a set of principles, processes and practices such as quarterly PI Planning, System Demos, and PI Objectives to help create a big picture view of work in progress at the program-level and foster mission alignment, while working across multiple stakeholders within an organization.

projectGoal: Two scrum teams will work in sprints for 12 months to deliver the required fixes and enhancement to ensure Bed Management Solution and will replace the embedded proprietary COTS product, Info World Inflow.

projectGoal:
Joint DoD/VA effort demonstrating data as a strategic asset for both agencies operational needs.

projectGoal: An integration framework with 250+ application programming interfaces (APIs) that support application connections to VA Enterprise Systems to retrieve authoritative Veteran data.
